name: riotabidva
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(crio(s0, c0, w1), crio(s0, c0, w2)))
bodyPretty: ⊢ (w0 → iota(s0 ∈ c0, w1)= iota(s0 ∈ c0, w2))
